meanings.sent1: She misbegan her painting by using the wrong colors.
meanings.sent2: The chef misbegan the recipe by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent3: The magician misbegan his trick and made the rabbit disappear too soon.
meanings.sent4: The student misbegan the exam, answering the last question first.
meanings.sent5: The construction worker misbegan building the wall, causing it to collapse.

meanings.sent1: He misbegan his journey by taking the wrong turn.
meanings.sent2: The team misbegan their project, leading to delays.
meanings.sent3: The actor misbegan his performance by forgetting his lines.
meanings.sent4: The gardener misbegan planting the flowers, resulting in a messy garden.
meanings.sent5: The writer misbegan the story, starting with the ending first.
